quotes.quote: The righteous ones are always exhausting to have around.
The righteous man takes his life in his hand whenever he utters the truth.
Every righteous man or woman is entitled to revelation concerning his own affairs.
When you're righteous, you don't have to tell people that you're righteous.
Most of us have to be self-righteous before we can be righteous.
Those who are self-righteous are not prominent.
To be individually righteous is the first of all duties, come what may to ones self, to one's country, to society, and to civilization itself.
Redemption is prior to righteousness. You cannot be righteous until you are first redeemed.
Righteous people have no sense of humor.
No fury more righteous than that of a sinner accused of the wrong sin.

Self-righteous people can talk themselves into forgetting they are part of a civilization. They can then feed on that culture, bringing it down. It's happened many times in the past. It could happen to us.
Ye must leave righteous ways behind, not to speak of unrighteous ways.
Tell the righteous it will be well with them, for they will enjoy the fruit of their deeds.
There's no one so self-righteous as someone policing someone else's morality.
A righteous wife can make a poor man feel like a king.
To the self-righteous, being judged according to deeds does not seem too alarming but to the man who knows himself the thought is terrifying.
One of the best ways to celebrate righteous history is to make more of it, make more righteous history!
The self-righteous have their fig leaves so tightly bound that they have forgotten the seeping wounds beneath the foliage.
Even in a righteous cause force is a fearful thing; God only helps when men can help no more.
Righteous is the one who was able to demonstrate compassion in face of human suffering.
There are only two kinds of men: the righteous who think they are sinners and the sinners who think they are righteous.
It is a hard thing for a man to be righteous, if the unrighteous man is to have the greater right.
It is the duty of righteous men to make war on all undeserved privilege, but one must not forget that this is a war without end.
A puritan is a person who pours righteous indignation into the wrong things.
It's more important to be righteous than to be right.
We do not become righteous by doing righteous deed but, having been made righteous, we do righteous deeds.
A righteous man hates lying, But a wicked man is loathsome and comes to shame.
If a man aspires towards a righteous life, his first act of abstinence is from injury to animals.
Young people like to feel self-righteous, like they're on the right side of things.
A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
